##Top New York Attractions
```{r, echo=FALSE }
library(leaflet)
myLatLong <- data.frame(
     lat = c(40.748817, 40.689247, 40.785091),
     lng = c(-73.985428,-74.044502, -73.968285))
myPopup=c("Empire State Building, New York, NY, USA", 
          "Statue of Liberty National Monument, New York, USA",
          "Central Park, New York, NY, USA")
my_map <- myLatLong %>% leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(popup=myPopup)
my_map
```
